attributes.action: we want to take off the masks because we are hypoxic
attributes.additional_details:
I works in a mask 8 hours a day
I feel very bad I lack oxygen
all people are fed up with wearing protective masks
attributes.background:
we want to take off the masks because we are hypoxic
we are weak, the masks take away our oxygen
there is evidence that masks cause cell hypoxia
please let us take off the masks

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. People with medical conditions are already exempt from being required to wear a face covering. 

You might want to read this article about health and face coverings:

https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/53108405
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
